cyclone.name: ELSA
cyclone.current_location: about 475 mi ESE of Isla Beata, Dominican Republic
cyclone.trajectory: Moving quickly west-northwest across the eastern Caribbean; forecast to slow, turn northwest near Hispaniola, Jamaica and eastern Cuba, then approach the Florida Peninsula early next week.
cyclone.expected_landfall_location: southern coast of Hispaniola (near Punta Palenque area)

weather_observation.watch_coast: Hurricane Watch for portions of eastern Cuba; Tropical Storm Watch for parts of northern Dominican Republic, Saba, Sint Eustatius, Cayman Brac and Little Cayman.
weather_observation.warning_coast: Hurricane Warning for southern coast of Dominican Republic (Punta Palenque to Haitian border), southern Haiti (Port-au-Prince to Dominican border) and Jamaica; Tropical Storm Warning for northern Haiti coast and south-central Dominican Republic.
weather_observation.impacted_coast: Eastern & central Caribbean Islands, southern Hispaniola, Jamaica, eastern & central Cuba, and eventually the Florida Peninsula/Gulf Coast.
weather_observation.wind: No tropical-storm-force winds expected at Philadelphia Regional Port, PA during the 5-day forecast period.
